mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_exec_log(serial_id, exec_no, proc_name, trice, exec_log, create_time, field_01, field_02, field_03, field_04, field_05) values ( #{serialId}, #{execNo}, #{procName}, #{trice}, #{execLog}, now(), #{field01}, #{field02}, #{field03}, #{field04}, #{field05} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_exec_log set serial_id = #{serialId}, exec_no = #{execNo}, proc_name = #{procName}, trice = #{trice}, exec_log = #{execLog}, field_01 = #{field01}, field_02 = #{field02}, field_03 = #{field03}, field_04 = #{field04}, field_05 = #{field05}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select serial_id as serialId, exec_no as execNo, proc_name as procName, trice as trice, exec_log as execLog, create_time as createTime, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_sys_exec_log where id = #{id}
select version from t_sys_exec_log where id = #{id}

select serial_id as serialId, exec_no as execNo, proc_name as procName, trice as trice, exec_log as execLog, create_time as createTime, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_sys_exec_log

select serial_id as serialId, exec_no as execNo, proc_name as procName, trice as trice, exec_log as execLog, create_time as createTime, field_01 as field01, field_02 as field02, field_03 as field03, field_04 as field04, field_05 as field05 from t_sys_exec_log limit #{pageSize} offset #{pageIndex}
